entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
